q1: Who is the capital of the Colombia football team/
a1: Radamel Falcao is the captain of Colombia.
a2: If he is a good player, he had an injury that complicated him but he was one of the best strikers in the world
q3: Because of talented players like Falcao, Colombia is ranked 16th in the world for football.
q4: Do you think Columbia has a chance to win the Gold Cup?
a4: They are always competitive so yeah!
a5: Arsenal when they travel down south.
